snippet.title: Pikmin 2: Kaizo Edition Initial Trailer
snippet.description:
Decided to go vanilla stats, custom overworld, and RNG caves for a much more difficult Pikmin 2 experience. Prepare an army and march in the once-safe environments of new dangers, great treasure, and deeper subterraneans.
2.0 and 3.1 versions have modified enemy stats for added challenge, but 2.0 does not have the quality of life introduced in 1.1. Delvers beware.

Download (1.0): https://drive.google.com/open?id=14cUvoR3zlr5FT-xfLb1K8snypaDtVa8R
Speedrunner Update (1.1): https://drive.google.com/open?id=1NpRuNzRYcnwYKxcy-ZmjLlh1OcEdgis6
Far More Difficult Version (2.0): https://drive.google.com/open?id=1iTbZedd7CxHI_56SBzkcXURiBqv0NKAf
The Most Chaotic Evil (3.1): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-4Tc0QcXR5sLHETTtlwgXlSypzMY2wx_

Yay, social media! :D
Discord: https://discord.gg/5cnYY7J
